item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: Adam Chidlow
item.description: As you have probably already gathered, I’ve decided to start a blog. This is something I’ve been meaning to do for quite some time. I expect to be posting mostly about artificial intelligence, mathematics & statistics, computer science, programming, etc.
item.content:encoded: As you have probably already gathered, I’ve decided to start a blog. This is something I’ve been meaning to do for quite some time. I expect to be posting mostly about artificial intelligence, mathematics & statistics, computer science, programming, etc.
